alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 2:21PM EDT until March 31 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Northampton County in northeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Greensville County in southeastern Virginia... Central Southampton County in southeastern Virginia... Central Sussex County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roanoke Rapids, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dahlia and Seaboard around 230 PM EDT. Claresville and Green Plain around 240 PM EDT. Sussex and Homeville around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Adams Grove, Grizzard, Lanes Corner, Yale, Lumberton, Bryants Corner, Worrell, Hilda and Dory. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
